headline: Compared to Estimates, The Hartford Insurance Group (HIG) Q3 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for The Hartford Insurance Group (HIG) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended September 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Hartford (NYSE:HIG) Posts Better-Than-Expected Sales In Q3
summary: Insurance and financial services company The Hartford (NYSE:HIG) reported Q3 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 7.1% year on year to $7.23 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.78 per share was 17.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: The Hartford Announces Record Third Quarter Earnings
summary: HARTFORD, Conn., October 27, 2025--The Hartford (NYSE: HIG) today announced financial results for the third quarter ended Sept. 30, 2025.

headline: Hartford (HIG): Exploring Valuation After Recent Sector Volatility and Analyst Price Target Updates
summary: Hartford Insurance Group (HIG) shares have seen some movement in recent weeks, drawing the attention of investors interested in the broader insurance sector. With its solid financial track record, Hartford continues to be a company many keep an eye on. See our latest analysis for Hartford Insurance Group.
